issue.title: [Python][Docs] Fill in section about Custom Schema and Field Metadata
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, that secion (https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/data.html#custom-schema-and-field-metadata) only has the content "TODO".
